00049 //
00050 // Unpacker
00051 //
00052 // 17 March 2004 -- tds
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_UNPACKER_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_UNPACKER_HPP
00057 
00058 #include <string>
00059 #include <map>
00060 #include "indri/XMLNode.hpp"
00061 
00062 namespace indri {
00063   namespace lang {
00064     class RawExtentNode;
00065     class ScoredExtentNode;
00066 
00067     class Unpacker {
00068     private:
00069       XMLNode* _root;
00070       std::map<std::string, class Node*> _nodes;
00071       XMLNode* _current;
00072 
00073       Node* _unpack( XMLNode* child );
00074 
00075     public:
00076       Unpacker( XMLNode* root );
00077       std::vector<Node*> unpack();
00078       std::string getString( const char* stringName ) ;
00079       UINT64 getInteger( const char* name );
00080       double getDouble( const char* name );
00081       RawExtentNode* getRawExtentNode( const char* name );
00082       std::vector<RawExtentNode*> getRawExtentVector( const char* name );
00083       std::vector<ScoredExtentNode*> getScoredExtentVector( const char* name );
00084       std::vector<int> getIntVector( const char* name );
00085       std::vector<double> getDoubleVector( const char* name ) ;
00086       ScoredExtentNode* getScoredExtentNode( const char* name );
00087       bool getBoolean( const char* name );
00088 
00089       template<class T>
00090       std::vector<T*> getNodeVector( const char* name ) {
00091         std::vector<T*> result;
00092         const XMLNode* vector = _current->getChild(name);
00093 
00094         for( unsigned int i=0; i<vector->getChildren().size(); i++ ) {
00095           XMLNode* ref = vector->getChildren()[i];
00096           T* node = dynamic_cast<T*>(_nodes[ref->getValue()]);
00097           result.push_back(node);
00098         }
00099 
00100         return result;
00101       }
00102     };
00103   }
00104 }
00105 #endif // INDRI_UNPACKER_HPP
